name: Neopets - Optimized
description:
_For all pages_
Ads, the sidebar, and the footer are removed. (Although, you probably don't have to worry about the ads if you use an adblocker. ;P)

_For Neoquest II (One of my favorite games C:)_
The do nothing/wait X seconds buttons are removed. (I don't use 'em. :U)

_For Profiles_
Collections, Neohome and Trophies are removed. (I like the profile without 'em, it looks cleaner. C: )

_For the Stock Market_
The marquee is removed, because it's annoying. DDDD:
